name: Countless Sights to See
title: Kirara: Countless Sights to See
in_play_description: When your Kirara who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kirara to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Kirara, equip this card. After Kirara equips this card, immediately use Meow-teor Kick once. When your Kirara who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round) (You must have Kirara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
